description: Deletes the specified virtual tape from the virtual tape shelf (VTS). This operation is only supported in the tape gateway type.

parameters.name: TapeARN
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the virtual tape to delete from the virtual tape shelf (VTS).

nested_items.name: TapeARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the virtual tape that was deleted from the virtual tape shelf (VTS).
